meanings: [왜] why, for what reason[purpose], [구어] what... for, [속어] how come, [근거] on what ground.
[왜] why, for what reason, what...for, how come, [근거] on what ground.
(우연히, 뜻밖에) accidentally, by chance, by accident, somehow
(이따금) at times sometimes, occasionally, (every) once in a while, from time to time, (every) now and then,

vlive.korean: 어째서 출근? Why do you need to go work? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 공연 1시간 반 전🐰

vlive.korean: [왜(어째서~) 난데야넹~] - 맨날 난데야넹! - 맞아요. [Nandeyaneng] - Every day, Nandeyaneng! - Right. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [2년 전 오늘의 TWICE] 오사카 짝꿍즈 귀여움이 무리무리데쓰😆 (Sana&Jihyo speaking Osaka dialect)
왜? 어째서? Why? How come? 듣기 View video KIM SO JUNG : <김소정> 더위가 가기 전에 빙수를 먹어봅시다
어째서 그런 말 하는 거지? Why are you saying that? 듣기 View video iKON : 안녀어어어엉
어째서요? - 분위기가 되게 오묘하면서도... Why? - It's very mysterious and... 듣기 View video VIXX : VIXX 더 스포타임!
